name: The House (of wasps and frogs) Always Wins
name_original: The House (of wasps and frogs) Always Wins
description:
Created by AwesomeTurtle70 and ElaineStarless for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

A video game where you fight off waves upon waves of horrible beasts because you got a bit unlucky at the casino and need to pay off your debt of 2,000,000 dollars. And I mean while you're here you might as well roll some more dice right? Why not, couldn't make things any worse.

Some tips:

-Kill enemies to charge up your dice

-Rolling dice is an AOE attack that also rerolls your look, stats, and gun

-The longer you go without rolling dice, the more enemies will show up, so reroll often!

-If you're having trouble with wasps, try running circles around them
